metadata.Title: CVE-2017-15056 on Ubuntu 21.04 (hirsute) - low.
metadata.Description: p_lx_elf.cpp in UPX 3.94 mishandles ELF headers, which allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (application crash) or possibly have unspecified other impact via a crafted binary file, as demonstrated by an Invalid Pointer Read in PackLinuxElf64::unpack().

criterions.comment: upx-ucl package in hirsute, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '3.94-4').
